Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 22nd overall pick, by Toledo in 1976...
Injured on 4/25/1977 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/13/1982 with a Bruised Hip, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1983, off George Popovich (NJ)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/12/1983, off Bob Mariano (PIT)...
Injured on 5/2/1985 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/13/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $3,600,000 per year...
